de.iabg.mesh.io
Class ASCIIMeshConnectionWriter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Writer
      java.io.OutputStreamWriter
          java.io.FileWriter
              de.iabg.mesh.io.ASCIIMeshConnectionWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MeshConnectionWriter, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable
public class ASCIIMeshConnectionWriter
extends java.io.FileWriter
implements MeshConnectionWriter

This implementation of MeshConnectionWriter writes an ASCII file containing mesh connection data, namely the node connections. Refer to MeshConnectionWriter class API for more details.

Version:
November 1, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE

Method Detail

exportNodeConnections

public void exportNodeConnections(NodeConnectionMatrix connections)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: MeshConnectionWriter
Writes the given node connections. This method should be called after MeshConnectionWriter.setFirstMeshFile(java.io.File) and MeshConnectionWriter.setLastMeshFile(java.io.File) so that the file data can also be written.

Specified by:
exportNodeConnections in interface MeshConnectionWriter
Parameters:
connections - the NodeConnectionMatrix to be written
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the file could not be written

writeBreak

protected void writeBreak()
Writes a formatted line break to the file.

writeComment

protected void writeComment(java.lang.String line)
Writes a formatted comment line to the file from the given line.

Parameters:
line - the comment line

writeHeader

protected void writeHeader()
Writes the standard header to the file. This header contains information for the time and date, the First Mesh file and the Last Mesh file.

writeNodeConnection

protected void writeNodeConnection(int nodeConnectionIndex)
Writes a node connection to the file from the given node connection index. This method accesses the data at that index from the stored NodeConnectionMatrix and outputs the data to a formatted line.

Parameters:
nodeConnectionIndex - the index of the node connection
